item.title: Memorial Day Weekend - Sunday
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: We didn't do all that much on Saturday for our holiday, but on Sunday we did a day of Disney (a favorite past time of ours) to get out of the house into the sun and also so my wife can build up her photography portfolio. The first park we hit was Animal Kingdom.
